column4: hi anyone using Avidemux 2.4.1 ? I am planning to convert a .mkv to avi but I got error on audio decoder.No audio decoder found for this file.The audio code is mp4a
vlc will play .mkv fyi
: yep , it does play , but I wanted to convert it to .avi
you want to burn it to dvd for external dvd player? any reason other than that?
: I can't find a software working converting .mkv to avi
: I just wanted to convert h264 to xivd .
: I installed most of them already.I am able to convert h264 to xivd but the audio doesn't work
: ACC mp4a
aac?
: how to convert using vlc?
: yeh , AAC audio file mp4a format
you got the ffmpeg from medibuntu.org ?
: I am sure I had install . how to check whether I install it correctly ?
that is odd, it seems not to be there anymore for jaunty
: I am using hardy 8.04
then it is there
: I am really out of idea now
you need to remove the version you have and install the one from medibuntu.org
: I dont quite get it here http://www.mail-archive.com/universe-bugs@lists.ubuntu.com/msg64573.html
uninstall current version of ffmpeg, get the version from medibuntu.org ; instructions on the site
: reading now
